title: La Biblia del Manual de Medicina de Supervivencia [The Survival Medicine Handbook Bible]
author: Jessica Williams
description: Check out this great listen on Audible.com. El mundo esta cambiando y hemos entrado en una nueva era debido a la pandemia de COVID-19. Nadie podria haber predicho que todas las cosas que damos por sentadas podrian ser arrebatadas repentinamente. Una de las cosas afectadas fue la disponibilidad de ...

-
La Biblia del Manual de Medicina de Supervivencia [The Survival Medicine Handbook Bible]
- 3 en 1: La guía completa para principiantes + Consejos y trucos para prepararse para cualquier emergencia + La guía Esencial de medicina de supervivencia
-

[Bibiana Segura](/search?searchNarrator=Bibiana+Segura&ref=a_pd_La-Bib_c1_narrator_1&pf_rd_p=df6bf89c-ab0c-4323-993a-2a046c7399f9&pf_rd_r=HX7RM0NQ9P9X5QTAENRF&pageLoadId=uXd3wdm7Al1x2MW8&creativeId=16015ba4-2e2d-4ae3-93c5-e937781a25cd)

-
Surviving the Great Reset
- A Deep Dive into the New World Order and What It Means to You from A-Z
- By: Steve Abbott
- Narrated by: Betty Johnston
- Length: 3 hrs and 39 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Do you ever feel that something is just not right in the world we live in today? Do you feel like there’s an unspoken disconnect between what you’re being told and what’s actually happening before your eyes? In fact, millions of people around the world share this mysterious sense of disillusionment—and for good reason. We’re in the midst of a massive global shift. A shift that is unprecedented in human history. This shift will change every aspect of our lives. This is called the Great Reset. This book is your guide to understanding this paradigm-shifting phenomenon.
-
-
Surviving the Great Reset
- By Saif on 10-19-22
By:
[Steve Abbott](/search?searchAuthor=Steve+Abbott&ref=a_pd_La-Bib_c5_adblp13npsbx_1_1_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=HX7RM0NQ9P9X5QTAENRF&pageLoadId=uXd3wdm7Al1x2MW8&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1)
-
Off-Grid Projects
- A Comprehensive Beginner’s Guide to Learn About the Realms of Off-Grid Living and Building a Life of Self-Sufficiency
- By: Jimson Lewis
- Narrated by: Ben Herold
- Length: 3 hrs and 15 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Moving off the grid can completely change the trajectory of your life. You will raise your own livestock, grow your own crops, and meet all your needs by taking advantage of nature's resources. Forget about soul-crushing jobs that leave you feeling empty. There is a purity to feeding yourself and providing for yourself without being forced to endure such a hollow existence. This book will teach you to reconnect with the natural world and create a little slice of paradise far from modern society. There is more meaning in a simple life, and you will learn exactly how to achieve that.
-
-
Amazing guide
- By Janif on 03-01-23
By:
[Jimson Lewis](/search?searchAuthor=Jimson+Lewis&ref=a_pd_La-Bib_c5_adblp13npsbx_1_2_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=HX7RM0NQ9P9X5QTAENRF&pageLoadId=uXd3wdm7Al1x2MW8&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1)
-
The Survival Medicine Handbook Bible
- 3 in 1- The Complete Beginner’s Guide+ Tips and Tricks to Prepare for Any Emergency+ The Essential Guide of Natural Medicine, Essential Oils, and Natural Remedies
- By: Jessica Williams
- Narrated by: Betty Johnston
- Length: 11 hrs and 6 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Natural medicine is an ancient practice and has been practiced by many cultures for thousands of years. It works and can be used along with modern medicine. This book will help you learn everything you need to know to get started with natural medicine. This book provides all the information you need to deal with emergencies and survival situations effectively. Packed with useful information, how-to, and step-by-step recipes, this is your reference guide for whenever disaster strikes.
-
-
Highly recommend
- By Ravi on 03-09-23
By:
[Jessica Williams](/author/Jessica-Williams/B0B1LZBJZ2?ref=a_pd_La-Bib_c5_adblp13npsbx_1_3_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=HX7RM0NQ9P9X5QTAENRF&pageLoadId=uXd3wdm7Al1x2MW8&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1)
-
Off-Grid Projects: 3 in 1
- A Comprehensive Beginner’s Guide + Tips and Tricks of Effective Survival Techniques + Simple and Effective Methods of Farming
- By: Jimson Lewis
- Narrated by: Ben Herold
- Length: 10 hrs and 28 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
This comprehensive collection will show you the ropes of the survivalist lifestyle, teach you numerous skills, and introduce ready-to-apply DIY projects for your personal sustenance. Buy now to become an accomplished and intrepid survivalist.
-
-
Informative book
- By Francom on 04-01-23
By:
[Jimson Lewis](/search?searchAuthor=Jimson+Lewis&ref=a_pd_La-Bib_c5_adblp13npsbx_1_4_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=HX7RM0NQ9P9X5QTAENRF&pageLoadId=uXd3wdm7Al1x2MW8&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1)

Proyectos Off-Grid [Off Grid Projects]
- Una Guía Completa para Principiantes para Aprender sobre los Reinos de la Vida Off-Grid y Construir una Vida de Autosuficiencia
- By: Jimson Lewis
- Narrated by: Salvador Marini
- Length: 3 hrs and 18 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
No te esfuerces haciendo algo que odias. En lugar de ganar dinero para comprar alimentos y pagar facturas, alejese de la red. Puede cambiar completamente la trayectoria de tu vida. Criara su propio ganado, cultivara sus propios cultivos y satisfara todas sus necesidades aprovechando los recursos de la naturaleza.
-
-
Recomendaría este libro a cualquiera que esté busc
- By Ravi on 05-24-23
By:

Surviving the Great Reset
- 3 in 1: A Deep Dive into the New World Order + Tips and Tricks to Rescue Your Savings + A Comprehensive Guide to Master Your Life and Wealth Like the Elite
- By: Steve Abbott
- Narrated by: Betty Johnston
- Length: 10 hrs and 54 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
If you want to invest in the market and ensure you continue to make a profit, you must ensure you have the necessary capital and funds to cover your losses. If you want to make a huge return, you should invest wisely. Any stock listed in the market can be traded publicly. Any currency or bond can also be traded publicly. Having said that, you must have an emergency fund to cover your losses. The price of the stock or any currency will reflect the performance of the organization or government backing it, respectively.
-
-
Powerful Guide
- By Ravi on 05-24-23

Entrevista de PM [PM Interview]
- Una Guía Completa para Principiantes para Aprender y Estudiar las Preguntas y Respuestas de las Entrevistas de Trabajo para Gestores de Proyectos (Libro En Español)
- By: Jefferey Michaels
- Narrated by: Salvador Marini
- Length: 3 hrs and 30 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
En esta guía informativa y práctica, aprenderá todo lo que necesita saber sobre el proceso de la entrevista de trabajo de gestión de proyectos, desde los diferentes tipos de preguntas que se harán hasta la mejor manera de responderlas. Mientras que muchos libros sobre la gestión de proyectos se centran en los aspectos técnicos del trabajo, este libro se centra en el lado humano, dándole las habilidades interpersonales que necesita para asentar su entrevista y conseguir el trabajo que desea.
-
-
Este libro es una herramienta
- By Ravi on 05-22-23

- Consejos y Trucos de Técnicas de Supervivencia Efectivas para Sobrevivir en Cualquier Lugar, Construyendo Sistemas Solares para su ... y Proyectos de Bricolaje

Story
¡Sumérgete en el fascinante mundo de los proyectos fuera de la red! ¿Alguna vez has contemplado vivir fuera de la red? ¿Le atrae la perspectiva de una supervivencia autosuficiente? ¿Es el ingenio una habilidad que siempre has querido perfeccionar? Si su respuesta a estas preguntas es "sí", ha venido al lugar correcto. Esta guía completa le mostrará las cuerdas del estilo de vida de supervivencia, le enseñará numerosas habilidades y le presentará proyectos de bricolaje listos para aplicar para su sustento personal.
-

Herbal Antibiotics
- A Comprehensive Beginner's Guide to Learn to Make Effective Herbal Antibiotics to Cure Daily Ailments
- By: Jack Marcus
- Narrated by: Betty Johnston
- Length: 4 hrs and 5 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Learn how to make effective herbal antibiotics to cure daily ailments! By introducing you to antibiotics and their herbal counterparts, explaining the difference between the various herbal antibiotics, and providing plenty of user-friendly natural recipes, this audiobook will prepare you for handling any condition that comes with an infection.
-
-
self-care and natural remedies
- By Ravi on 05-22-23
By:
[Jack Marcus](/author/Jack-Marcus/B0BHF4SCR2?ref=a_pd_La-Bib_c5_adblp13npsbx_2_6_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=HX7RM0NQ9P9X5QTAENRF&pageLoadId=uXd3wdm7Al1x2MW8&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1)
Publisher's summary
El mundo esta cambiando y hemos entrado en una nueva era debido a la pandemia de COVID-19. Nadie podria haber predicho que todas las cosas que damos por sentadas podrian ser arrebatadas repentinamente. Una de las cosas afectadas fue la disponibilidad de la medicina moderna. La vida a la que estabamos tan acostumbrados cambia por completo en semanas. Todos tenemos problemas, ya sea con medicamentos, comida o dinero.
El mundo sigue cambiando y ya nada es seguro. Es necesario volver a la naturaleza para complementar y complementar la medicina moderna en tiempos como estos. Esto puede ayudarte a sobrevivir en tiempos dificiles. La medicina natural es una practica antigua y ha sido practicada por muchas culturas durante miles de anos. Funciona y puede usarse junto con la medicina moderna. Este libro te ayudara a aprender todo lo que necesitas saber para iniciarte en la medicina natural.
En este libro, usted:
- Aprende sobre la historia de la medicina natural y de supervivencia.
- Comprender el valor de los aceites esenciales
- Conozca mas sobre que son los aceites Carrier
- Descubre los usos de la Aromaterapia
- Aprende diferentes recetas de mezclas, balsamos y cataplasmas.
- Aprenda varios consejos e ideas de medicina de supervivencia
Entonces, Que esperas? Haz clic en el boton comprar ahora y da tus primeros pasos para equiparte con las herramientas esenciales para sobrevivir en la naturaleza.
Que tecnicas de primeros auxilios necesitas dominar?
Este libro practico analiza la importancia de la preparacion para desastres cuando se trata de emergencias. Explica las diferentes medidas que puede tomar para manejar situaciones que requieren una respuesta rapida. Mas importante aun, destaca los pasos importantes que puede tomar para adquirir habilidades de supervivencia que estan listas para aplicar en una variedad de situaciones de alto riesgo o que amenazan la vida.
En este libro, usted:
- Descubre la importancia de estar medicamente preparado
- Aprenda como convertirse en un recurso medico de referencia para su comunidad
- Comprender la importancia de tener suministros medicos.
- Domina diferentes habilidades de supervivencia.
- Aprende a cultivar un jardin medicinal
- Explora el mundo de los aceites esenciales y sus beneficios
- Descubre diferentes tipos de remedios naturales
- Comprender como funcionan los tes, las tinturas y las hierbas que salvan vidas
- Aprenda a prepararse para todo tipo de desastres naturales
Este libro proporciona toda la informacion que necesita para hacer frente a emergencias y situaciones de supervivencia con eficacia. Repleto de informacion util, instrucciones y recetas paso a paso, esta es su guia de referencia para cuando ocurra un desastre.
Entonces, compre su propia copia hoy y use este libro para hacer una diferencia en su comunidad y salvar vidas.
Please note: This audiobook is in Spanish.

La Biblia del Manual de Medicina de Supervivencia" es una guía completa para aquellos interesados en aprender sobre la medicina de supervivencia. Related to this topic
-
How to Release Anxiety
- By: Gabrielle Bernstein
- Narrated by: Gabrielle Bernstein
- Length: 1 hr and 29 mins
- Original Recording
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
It’s not just you. Stress levels are at an all-time high—so much so that a recently convened panel of medical experts in the US has recommended that all adults under the age of 65 be screened for anxiety. In How to Release Anxiety, Gabby Bernstein offers simple, actionable steps for feeling better, living with more ease, and showing up for those around us. Gabby’s unusual advice: Rather than manage your anxiety, what if you befriended it? Gabby posits that what we befriend, we can ultimately be at ease with. So she invites us to get curious.
-

- By: Brian Cox

Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Our Bedtime Stories are designed to let you drift off with no nagging feeling that you need to listen through to the end. Their purpose is to let you slowly fall into peaceful, restful sleep. With that in mind, we present actor Brian Cox—Golden Globe winner for his portrayal of media tycoon Logan Roy in HBO’s Succession—returning to his Scottish roots with these evocative tales from the Scottish Highlands.

Story

Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
The latest groundbreaking tome from Tim Ferriss, the number-one New York Times best-selling author of The 4-Hour Workweek. For the last two years, I've interviewed more than 200 world-class performers for my podcast, The Tim Ferriss Show. The guests range from super celebs (Jamie Foxx, Arnold Schwarzenegger, etc.) and athletes (icons of powerlifting, gymnastics, surfing, etc.) to legendary Special Operations commanders and black-market biochemists. For most of my guests, it’s the first time they’ve agreed to a two-to-three-hour interview.

- Length: 10 hrs and 44 mins

Overall

Performance

Story
Based on seven years of ground-breaking research and hundreds of interviews, I Thought It Was Just Me shines a long-overdue light on an important truth: Our imperfections are what connect us to each other and to our humanity. Our vulnerabilities are not weaknesses; they are powerful reminders to keep our hearts and minds open to the reality that we're all in this together.

The Gift of Fear
- Survival Signals That Protect Us from Violence
- By: Gavin de Becker
- Narrated by: Gavin de Becker
- Length: 12 hrs and 50 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
These days, no one in America feels immune to violence. But now, in this extraordinary, groundbreaking book, the nation's leading expert on predicting violent behavior unlocks the puzzle of human violence and shows that, like every creature on earth, we have within us the ability to predict the harm others might do us and get out of its way. Contrary to popular myth, human violence almost always has a discernible motive and is preceded by clear warning signs.

- Length: 7 hrs and 39 mins
- Unabridged

Story
Russ Harris offers a surprising solution to low self-confidence, shyness, and insecurity: Rather than trying to "get over" our fears, he says, the secret is to form a new and wiser relationship with them. Paradoxically, it's only when we stop struggling against our fearfulness that we begin to find lasting freedom from it.

The Explosive Child
- A New Approach for Understanding and Parenting Easily Frustrated, Chronically Inflexible Children
- By: Dr. Ross W. Greene
- Narrated by: Dr. Ross W. Greene
- Length: 2 hrs and 38 mins
- Abridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Dr. Ross Greene, a distinguished clinician and pioneer in the treatment of kids with social, emotional, and behavioral challenges, has worked with thousands of explosive children, and he has good news: these kids aren't attentionseeking, manipulative, or unmotivated, and their parents aren't passive, permissive disciplinarians. Rather, explosive kids are lacking some crucial skills in the domains of flexibility/adaptability, frustration tolerance, and problem solving, and they require a different approach.
